name: @ggedde/spry-js
author: ggedde
description: A simple JS Toolkit while being as lightweight as possible

scripts.build-js:
bun build ./src/spry.ts --outdir ./dist --entry-naming spry.js --minify --format iife --banner='/*
* SpryJs 1.0.0
* https://ggedde.github.io/spry-js
*/'
scripts.watch-js:
bun build ./src/spry.ts --outdir ./dist --entry-naming spry.js --minify --watch --format iife --banner='/*
* SpryJs 1.0.0
* https://ggedde.github.io/spry-js
*/'
scripts.build: bun run build-esm; bun run build-js; cp ./dist/spry.js ./docs/spry.js; cp ./dist/spry.mjs ./docs/spry.mjs
scripts.build-docs-css: node_modules/.bin/postcss ./docs/docs.css --map false -o ./docs/docs.min.css; wc -c ./docs/docs.min.css | awk '{ total = int( ($1 / 1024) * 10) / 10; print total " KB"}' && gzip -c4 ./docs/docs.min.css | wc -c | awk '{ total = int( ($1 / 1024) * 10) / 10; print total " KB" }'
scripts.build-docs-js: node_modules/.bin/terser ./docs/docs.js --config-file .terser -o ./docs/docs.min.js; wc -c ./docs/docs.min.js | awk '{ total = int( ($1 / 1024) * 10) / 10; print total " KB"}' && gzip -c4 ./docs/docs.min.js | wc -c | awk '{ total = int( ($1 / 1024) * 10) / 10; print total " KB" }'
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-docs-css; npm run build-docs-js
scripts.dev: bun run watch-esm | bun run watch-js
